name: Action
description: Fast-paced movies with a lot of physical activities, fights, and stunts.

name: Drama
description: Movies that focus on emotional development and interaction between characters.

name: Comedy
description: Light-hearted movies intended to make the audience laugh.

name: Horror
description: Movies designed to frighten and create an atmosphere of fear and dread.

name: Science Fiction
description: Movies that explore futuristic concepts, advanced technology, and the unknown.

name: Romance
description: Movies focused on love stories and emotional connections between characters.

name: Thriller
description: Movies that create excitement and suspense, often with plot twists.

name: Documentary
description: Non-fiction movies that aim to document reality, often for educational or historical purposes.

name: Fantasy
description: Movies set in imaginary universes with magical or supernatural elements.

name: Adventure
description: Movies that emphasize exploration, journeys, and challenges, often in exotic settings.

name: Animation
description: Movies created using drawings, models, or computer graphics.
